title: Pranking Our Housemate
description: Being the first to arrive back at the house, we decided to play a prank on our housemate.

title: A Heartbreaking Story
description: Out of jealousy over a silly relationship, I made this video for myself.

title: Viral Dance by an Attractive Girl
description: I'm not impressed by this girl's dancing, and I'm not the type of guy who appreciates overly sexualized performances.

title: Struggling with Dance Moves
description: I'm not a great dancer, so I challenged myself to dance with my brother.

title: TikTok Picture Challenge
description: I synchronized the beat with my picture, and it turned out amazing.

title: Hokage Chat Skills
description: Chatting with my fellow scholar using hokage moves for fun.
